title: When people refuse to /ff

replies.body:
On the other hand, you've got players that as soon as you leave the fountain are like

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0UFLpvFnBFI/Ug2nS5APPRI/AAAAAAAAAgM/z8za5Ff2qFg/s1600/eore.jpg

"gg, it's over, can we FF now?"
"help I'm being held hostage in a video game I signed up to play!"
Id rather have a   Never Surrender Player

A player trying > a player not trying
And that 1 can be overlooked in a 4:1 ff vote :D

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Wi8YTVvW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-16T15:17:19.911+0000)
>
> On the other hand, you've got players that as soon as you leave the fountain are like
> 
> http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0UFLpvFnBFI/Ug2nS5APPRI/AAAAAAAAAgM/z8za5Ff2qFg/s1600/eore.jpg
> 
> "gg, it's over, can we FF now?"
> "help I'm being held hostage in a video game I signed up to play!"

I'm crying this great!
When you're the one who is 0-0-0 and literally everyone else on your team has 2 deaths OR MORE.

Game starts go into jungle before minions spawn
Support: "takes one auto attack"
ADC: GG surrender at 15 freaking support sucks
Maybe the ones who don't want to ff do so because that one is the last game of the day and wanna play  until the very end

> [{quoted}](name=DonCavallo,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Wi8YTVvW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-16T15:17:02.592+0000)
>
> Maybe the ones who don't want to ff do so because that one is the last game of the day and wanna play  until the very end

Half of the time this is the case for me lol

We lost scuttle.

https://i.imgur.com/EOcTU6B.gif[/img]

Unwinnable FF@15.

> [{quoted}](name=Full Brain,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Wi8YTVvW,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-16T16:37:16.921+0000)
>
> We lost scuttle.
> 
> https://i.imgur.com/EOcTU6B.gif[/img]
> 
> Unwinnable FF@15.

Let's be honest here, you're not really depicting actual scenarios of this case at all. Good meme nevertheless. 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Nirvinian,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Wi8YTVvW,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-11-16T17:27:18.188+0000)
>
> Let's be honest here, you're not really depicting actual scenarios of this case at all. Good meme nevertheless. 
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

I have legit had someone say this though. It was a damn Kha too back when the scuttle changes first came out. 
Hell even the buddy that he was playing with thought he cracked his nut.

I'd much rather have a team full of players saying do give up than a team of people that go gg it's over after first blood. This isn't even an exaggeration, I see people saying that so often. They'll die once in lane and go like, omg my lane is over and I'm completely useless now gg. It's so annoying. I don't find people who don't give up annoying at all.

I'm more of the "well, this match is screwed" kind of person. 

Not that I'm salty or pessimistic, it's more that I'm going to be either correct or pleasantly surprised.

Had a rengar under a eve invade at lvl 3-4 (?) because he didnt respect lane priority at all and got collapsed on while trying to chase her. 

"GG n00b team no map awareness."

Midlane? Ours had 30% mana and was pushed to tower.

Botlane? Ashe+vel koz vs Draven+thresh, also pushed to our side but just barely out of tower range.


Like......sure there are people who dont want to surrender, but some people seem to raise the white flag the moment the game starts because they forgot to bring some will to actually play ._.

And the vast majority i encounter are of that type, people who try surrender right away then when denied to they straight up start to grief/int/troll. 


OP reality is that the community is to a large degree rotten and in various ways too.......i mean serious lots of people want to surrender the moment the enemy side gets a 2 kills lead.

There's a surrender vote at some point in probably more than half the games I win. It's ridiculous how quickly scrubs want to surrender when they go into every match assuming they're the best player on their team but then things don't go their way.

Sometimes, not surrendering is more about sending a message to these people than thinking you can actually still win.
i see this allot in norms. people want to ff the moment the enemy gets first blood.
“They say I don’t know when to quit, like that’s a weakness.” {{champion:498}}
Baron and the enemy team will be super tilted.

Keep in mind, that's after everyone else has been chasing Teemo through his minefields with no vision whatsoever and allowing the enemy Yasuo to get free kills as Teemo spams /laugh while you're knocked up.

People surrender fast in the game because the game is base off of who is ahead, and how far. You wouldn't get any surrenders in this game if it was not so heavily team based and more about how well 1 player does.
honestly, I do it just to piss off people like you. IF you have no towers left then what's the point of FF? Is your time really that important that you can't spend a couple seconds?
Wahhhhhhhh we can't win waaahhhhbbhbb mommy he beat me so bad I don't want to plaeh anymurr waahhhhhhh. Uninstall scrub. Comebacks are some of the most thrilling and unforgettable plays.

nexus turrets still offer a chance in some cases but no turrets, HA HA HA we shall burn tonight in hekles together my brothers. at this point an ally tahm kench should assist handing the crazy over to the enemy
I mean..if there’s no turrets left that nexus will explode soon enough anyway.
Hahaha.

hey, how did you get that picture of me?
NEVER GIVE UP!!

tbh im comebacks are nowadays way harder but i havent ffed since early 2016.

so im kinda not ffing just to not ruin it.
xD

>
> hey, how did you get that picture of me?
> NEVER GIVE UP!!
> 
> tbh im comebacks are nowadays way harder but i havent ffed since early 2016.
> 
> so im kinda not ffing just to not ruin it.
> xD

Solid!
This describes me xD

Stupid. Comebacks are real. I won a lot of such games. For example: It was 17:2 in kills and 5:1 in turrets for enemies (21 minute). We killed fed enemy Vayne (caught alone in jgl) two times and in another and another  teamfight it was better and better. We won.
